Package arc.scene.ui

Class TextArea

java.lang.Object
arc.scene.Element
arc.scene.ui.TextField
arc.scene.ui.TextArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
Disableable
public class TextArea
extends TextField
A multiple-line text input field, entirely based on TextField
